about_the_game:
What is CyberSurfer?


Put down the controllers of yesterday and pick up your phone to experience an intuitive experience. Race on a hoverboard in time trials to get the best time and see who is the fastest in the world! Learn a new way to move through the universe, a new way to control your path!

In short, CyberSurfer is a desktop game with a mobile phone as the controller.

Your phone, a new controller


Pick up your smart phone to have an intuitive an exhilarating experience. Simply connect with the CyberSurfer app and be launched into the void.

How do I download the Mobile App?

Select the Mobile App OS to download the CyberSurfer mobile app!

Customize your hoverboard


What’s a cool way to show your cred. Show off your prized cyberboard. Race for amazing designs and hoverboards that help you in ways you never thought of.

Who is the fastest in the World?

Spanning over 300 years, a cybernetic racing culture defines many entities realites. Your purpose is to beat the tyranical robots no matter the cost. Play as a Human, Cyborg, or Robot and step up to the plate. Join the race, because there’s only one way out.


Travel the cybernetic universe while being transported by worm holes. Master the art of flying on the CyberBoard using astronomical phenomena to benefit your movements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, Radeon RX 580
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: Mobile Controller Support (iOS, Android)

short_description: CyberSurfer is an action-packed hoverboard racer, with your mobile phone as the controller. Race through a cyberpunk universe and strive for glory, fame, and power. Will you be the fastest?
